existing_features.title: Extend the existing URL parsing/rendering used by Community Board posts and comments to auto-embed videos for supported video URLs (at minimum YouTube and Vimeo) while keeping all other URLs rendered as normal clickable external links.
Apply video-embed rendering consistently anywhere the app currently uses LinkifiedText to render user-generated text (including CommunityBoardPage post title/body and PostComments comment content).

projectName: Add video embeds for supported video links
